data.name: Idle Champions - Celeste Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get an AWESOME boost to your power with a full set of rare items and an exclusive Golden Epic for Celeste! We'll also toss in 10 Gold Chests to power you up even more!

This pack includes:
Ornate Headband of Faith (Golden Epic)
Golden Gauntlet (Rare)
Thick Scalemail Belt (Rare)
Copper Amulet (Rare)
Chainmail Boots (Rare)
Ornate Holy Symbol (Rare)
10 Gold Chests

data.short_description: Get an AWESOME boost to your power with a full set of rare items and an exclusive Golden Epic for Celeste! We'll also toss in 10 Gold Chests to power you up even more!

fullgame.name: Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, or Windows 8 Classic
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
